name: d3-time-format
description: A JavaScript time formatter and parser inspired by strftime and strptime.

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && d3-bundler -n timeFormat -o build/time-format.js && uglifyjs build/time-format.js -c -m -o build/time-format.min.js && rm -f build/time-format.zip && zip -j build/time-format.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/time-format.js build/time-format.min.js
